page.title: 17CLUBS AND ACTIVITIES
page.content: {CLUBS AND ACTIVITIES.} {Playgroup} Mothers and children meet in Stenton Village Hall twice weekly. {Youth club}Teenagers meet in the hall weekly.They go on frequently on trips to the Ice rink,Swimming pools E.t.c.Organised by leaders. {Sunday School}Children meet on Sundays in the Village hall. {Badminton Club}Open to all age groups weekly throughout winter in the Village hall. {Drama Club }Open to all age groups.Several evenings throughout the year.{Darts}the Older people in the pub all year.{Bowling Club}for all age groups throughout the year.{The {community Association}is a voluntary orginisation representing all groups.They orginise{Galas}and{Fairs} and an annual {Burns Supper}as well as dances and concerts.
